pr_title: Fix Deletion of Title Block Elements

timeline.bodyText:
It shall be "2006, 2020"
But don't bother with updating them manually.
timeline.author: pdulth

replies.bodyText: I will wait for the build to be done and if successful I will fix it in another commit and we can merge right after.
replies.author: sandupostaru

timeline.message:
Fix Deletion of Title Block Elements

- Deletion of a Title Block cell clears the cell content
- Deletion of a Title Block deletes elements as expected, except for any
referenced Model Elements

Change-Id: If8a26cbcacab8562aa1d7752dfc5ec13d9480bfa
Signed-off-by: Sandu Postaru <sandu.postaru@thalesgroup.com>

Fix copyright
